scripts.all:create: yarn retro:create && yarn body:create && yarn sleep:create && yarn diary:dup
scripts.gcf:predeploy: yarn gcf:build && cp -v package.json dist/functions && cp -v yarn.lock dist/functions
scripts.gcf:hello:deploy: yarn gcf:predeploy && gcloud functions deploy helloWorld --runtime=nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --source=dist/functions
scripts.gcf:auth:deploy: yarn gcf:predeploy && gcloud functions deploy notionAuth --runtime=nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --source=dist/functions --set-env-vars NOTION_KEY=$NOTION_KEY
scripts.gcf:create:deploy: yarn gcf:predeploy && gcloud functions deploy notionCreatePage --runtime=nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --source=dist/functions --set-env-vars NOTION_KEY=$NOTION_KEY
